mapper.select: SELECT GOAL_ID AS goalId, USER_ID AS userId, CALORIES_KCAL AS caloriesKcal, PROTEIN_G AS proteinG, CARBS_G AS carbsG, FATS_G AS fatsG FROM USER_GOAL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY GOAL_ID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_GOAL ( USER_ID, CALORIES_KCAL, PROTEIN_G, CARBS_G, FATS_G ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{caloriesKcal}, #{proteinG}, #{carbsG}, #{fatsG} )
